title: I was really hoping they wouldn't develop this game
body:
Back in 2013 when the first development screenshots were released, I thought surely they wouldn't be stupid enough to release a game like this.
But here we are today:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9j9RWkPstc
A deep-voiced detective Pikachu that can't do any Pikachu stuff, and is attracted to human females to the point that he turns into Brock around them.
http://i.imgur.com/hwLGiPi.jpg
It just feels like a detective game that tacked on a few pokemon as an afterthought.
